title: Dante Eastern King Bed
description:
This fully padded blue velvet bedroom set is visually stunning, including beautiful channel tufting and contrasting welted trim arched head and footboards. Upholstered casegoods maintain the ambiance of this chic bedroom. Incorporating padded fronts, tapered chrome legs, single crystal-like pull knob buttons as well as glide side metal rails, and reinforced English dovetail joints. These offer abundant storage space to keep your new room clutter-free.
